Package chess

This package is used to create a Chess application including the GUI and game logic.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Seth Steinbrook and Getty Muthiani
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bishop
    This class represents a bishop and is used to identify all of the moves a bishop can make.
    BoardColors
    This class is used to create a pop up window that allows the players to change the colors of the squares on the chess board.
    BoardGUI
    This class creates the GUI application for a chess game.
    ChessBoard
    This class is used to create the chess board on the GUI, and set up all the event handlers for dragging and dropping the pieces.
    ChessPiece
    This is the parent class of each chess piece class.
    Clocks
    This class controls the clocks for both players.
    EmptyPiece
    This class represents a spot on the chess board that does not contain a piece.
    GameLogic
    This class controls the logic for the chess game such as verifying moves and identifying checkmates and stalemates.
    GameOverDialog
    This class is used to create a pop up window to display the results when the game has concluded.
    King
    This class represents a king and is used to identify all of the moves a king can make.
    Knight
    This class represents a knight and is used to identify all of the moves a knight can make.
    MatchSettings
    This class creates the section for players to select the time that each player starts with.
    Move
    This class represents and contains all of the details about a particular move.
    MovesList
    This class represents the grid of moves that is displayed under the heading Game Moves.
    Pawn
    This class represents a pawn and is used to identify all of the moves a pawn can make.
    PawnPromotionDialog
    This class is used to create a pop up window to display the pieces a player can promote a pawn to.
    PieceIcon
    This class is used to get images of every type of chess piece.
    Queen
    This class represents a queen and is used to identify all of the moves a queen can make.
    Rook
    This class represents a rook and is used to identify all of the moves a rook can make.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PieceType
    This enum contains all of the different types of chess pieces.
